column2: text
Dawi-Zharr Legion
Dark Mountain Denizens
The Dark Father's dominance is absolute.
The horrid and twisted creatures that stir both in and on the mountains of the Dawi-Zharr.
Kin of the Daemonforge
The hellish factories and dark forges of the Dawi-Zharr produce and attract a variety of monstrosities.
Dark Blessings to the Faithless
Mercenaries and slaves to the dark gods can be deserving of their blessings as any other.
Dawi-Zharr Regiment Training
Masters of ranged arms the Dawi-Zharr's expertise in volley fire techniques and manoeuvres are both feared and respected by many.
Fear and Fervour
When punishment for failure is worse than death, many will seek to die trying for success instead.
Daemonforged Arms
The hellish factories and dark forges of the Dawi-Zharr produce high quality ranged weapons of all kinds.
Servants of Hashut
The march of the Dawi-Zharr war machine is a dreadful sight to behold.
Twisted Dawi-Zharr Craft
Mastery of crafting arms and armour most wicked and corrupt.
Relentless Barrage
Load, shoot, march!
Loyalty of the Unbound
Veteran mercenaries and slaves can become as valuable as any chaos warrior.
Rapid Reloading
Load, aim, fire, repeat. The process becomes second nature to those well experienced with ranged weapons.
Marksman
Knowing where to aim is half of the job.
Over Loader
Always best to err on the side of caution when it comes to bullets, bolts and arrows.
Daemonic Rune Forging
The Dawi-Zharr have corrupted the old ways of runic inscription, and are capable of binding dark magic and demons into their twisted runes.
Rune of Volcanic Destruction
A hellish icon that brings the bearer visions of smouldering ruination, and the blessings of the fires of the daemonforges.
Rune of Daemonic Rage
A cursed icon that possesses the imbued with an unflinching and undying rage.
Rune of Shadows and Ash
Shifting shadows and the occasional cloud of ash constantly obscure the bearer of this rune.
Rune of Godly Favour
The dedicated forging of such powerful runic armour in itself is an act known to grant great favour with the Dark Father.
Warlord of Hashut
Bringer of Hashut's wrath.
Revenge of the Betrayed
The children of the Dark Father will seek his vengeance eternally.
Gifts of the Favoured
Bull Centaurs are often considered the chosen of Hashut, and as such gain his favour in many ways.
Bull's Charge
A penchant for killing via trampling under hoof.
Ravenous Fury
Ever vengeful and merciless, for the greatest spoils are found in destruction.
Terrible Dominion
Ascending in the ranks of the legion brings great respect, fear and infamy.
Mutations of Malice
Fearsome blessings of strength that often come with extra fangs or horns.
Shifting Legion
Able to move a horde in ways and at speeds unlike any Chaos Dwarf leader, Bull Centaurs excel at catching enemies off guard.
Pacts of the Changed
The loyalty that gifts of change buy is almost incomprehensible by the innocent.
Blessings of Fortitude
Hashut protects his champions well, all the better to spread his dominion.
Veteran Scouter
Master Cutthroat
Monster Tamer
High Khan
Champion of Slaves
Scouting just becomes second nature to those experienced in it.
Often tasked with suicidal assassination missions, many Hobgolins spend their time training for ways to live through such tasks.
Hobgoblins are capable of enslaving or taming monsters of various types, learning how to lose the least amount of soldiers in the process is the key.
Respected and feared... By other Hobgoblins of course.
Often having been slaves themselves, Hobgoblins are known to employ various tactics in the Dawi Zharr armies.
